content.raw: It's a bit tangential, but I noticed #1594 while testing this PR. You could add an extra warning to the collision/visual delete message if the user is trying to delete the last element to work around it. For example, if the user is deleting the only collision element, warn them that the link will not collide with anything (including the ground plane), or if they are deleting the only visual, warn them that the link will be invisible.
